fields.headline: Premonition
fields.bodyText: Sandra Bullock stars in this supernatural thriller about a woman who has a recurring nightmare - a premonition, if you will - that her husband is going to be killed in a crash. I myself have had horrible experiences like this. I remember watching Miss Congeniality and having a terrible premonition that I was going to die of embarrassment while watching future Sandra Bullock films in which she was going to act in exactly the same horrifically annoying way. Then I watched Miss Congeniality 2, and my scalp prickled with fear. I sat down to The Lake House, her supernatural romcom with Keanu Reeves, and it was all I could do not to scream with terror. Now this. How many times can the nightmare that is Sandra Bullock keep recurring?
